title: Recycle Bin
desc:
Post 108
- Fire a random shell that's already been used this round. Can't be used if at least 2 unique shells haven't been fired this round.
- **Have a Nice Death**
 - Gain a random **Have a Nice Death** item upon use UNLESS below condition applies AND you got this item from this attribute.
 - Fire a random non-safe shell that's already been used this round at yourself if you've already used 2+ **Have a Nice Death** items this game.
_ _
